src: “Yanzu muna bera mai watanni 4 wadanda ba su da ciwon sukari ba wadanda ke da suke fama da ciwon sukari,” in ji shi.
mt: “We are now treating four patients who do not have diabetes but are suffering from diabetes,” he said.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dokta Ehud Ur, farfesan magani a Jami’ar Dalhousie da ke Halifax, Nova Scotia kuma shugaban sashen likitanci da bangaren kimiyya na kungiyar masu ciwon sikari ta Kanada ya yi gargadin cewa har yanzu binciken yana kan farkonsa.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a medical oncologist at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the cancer care and research division of the Canadian Cancer Society, said the study is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Kamar wasu ƙwararrun, yana da shakkun cewa ko za a iya warkar da ciwon sukari, inda ya bayyana cewa sakamakon bincike ba shi da alaƙa da mutanen da tuni su ke da nau’in ciwon sukari na 1.
mt: As with other diseases, he expressed doubt that it could be eradicated, where he noted that the results of the study had no correlation with people who recently had type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: A ranar Litinin, Sara Danius, sakatariyar dindindin ta Kwamitin Adabi na kungiyar nagartattu a Kwalejin Nazarin Sweden, ta sanar a bainar jama'a yayin wani shirin rediyo a Sveriges Radio a Sweden kwamitin, ba zai iya kaiwa ga Bob Dylan kai tsaye ba game da lashe kyautar Nobel ta 2016 a Adabi, ta yi watsi da ita kokarinta na isa gare shi.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, secretary general of the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio show on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee would not be able to meet with Bob Dylan in person about the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, dismissing her own stated intention to do so.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius ya ce, “Yanzu haka ba mwa yin komi. Na kira na kuma aika emails zuwa abokan aikinsa na kusa na kuma anshi amsoshi masu kyau. A yanzu haka, wannan bai isa ba.”
mt: "Now is not the time to be quiet. I call on my closest colleagues to send emails and respond politely. Now is not the time."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: A baya, Shugaban kamfanin Ring, Jamie Siminoff, ya bayyana cewa kamfanin ya fara lokacin da ba a jiyo sauti kararrawar jikin ƙofar sa daga shagonsa a cikin garejinsa.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff had stated that the company began ringing its doorbell chime from within its factory.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Ya ce, ya gina ƙararrawar ƙofa ta WiFi.
mt: He said, "I built a WiFi hotspot."
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff ya ce tallace-tallace sun bunkasa bayan bayyanarsa a 2013 a cikin wani taron fim na Shark Tank inda taron kwamitin ya nuna ba da tallafin farawa.
mt: Siminoff said the company grew after his appearance on the 2013 reality show Shark Tank, where the panel of investors offered him start-up funding.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: A ƙarshen 2017, Siminoff ya bayyana a tashar telebijin mai sayarwa ta QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring ta kuma sasanta takardar kotu tsakanin wata kamfanin adawa na tsaro wato ADT Corporation.
mt: The suit also names ADT Corporation, a security company.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Yayinda allurar gwaji rigakafi guda daya ta bayyana tana iya rage mutuwar cutar ta Ebola, har zuwa yanzu, babu wasu kwayoyi da aka nuna da suka dace da maganin cututtukan da suke kamuwa da su.
mt: While one experimental vaccine has shown promise in reducing Ebola deaths, there are no other drugs or vaccines that have been shown to be effective against the diseases it targets.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Wani hadaddiyar giyar, ZMapp, da farko ya nuna alƙawari a fagen, amma nazarin yau da kullun ya nuna cewa ba shi da fa'ida fiye da yadda ake neman hana mutuwa.
mt: A standard dose of ZMapp, initially showed promise in trials, but ongoing studies show it has no benefit over attempts to prevent death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: a nan gwajin PALM, ZMapp yayi bauta a wajen kula, hakan na nufin masana fasaha sun yi amfani da shi a matsayin kasan idan ka kimanta da hanyoyin guda uku nashi.
mt: In the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a placebo, meaning researchers used it as a control when comparing it to two other methods.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Masu wasan tsalle tsalle na Amurka sun goyi bayan wasikar kwamitin gasar olympic tare da yarda da cikakkiyar bukatar duk masu wasan olympic da su yada maganar samar da yanayi mara hadari ga dukkan yan wasanmu.
mt: U.S. athletes endorsed an Olympic committee letter with full support for all Olympic athletes to promote a healthy environment for all of our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Mun yarda da bayanin USOC cewa bukatun 'yan wasanmu da kungiyar mu, da wasanninsu, na iya zama mafi alheri ta ci gaba tare da canji mai ma'ana a cikin ƙungiyarmu, maimakon ƙaddamar da doka.
mt: We acknowledge the USOC's statement that our athletes' and federation's needs and our sport's best interests may be served by a meaningful change within our federation, rather than by imposing sanctions.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Kungiyan daki motsa jiki na USA na goyon bayan bincike mai zaman kanta wadda take zaton zata kara haske kan cin zarafi wadda wadanda suka tsira daga Larry Nassar suka bayana wadda ba a gano ba na tsawon lokaci kuma ke rungume da duk wani canji mai muhimmanci.
mt: The USA Gymnastics investigation into Nassar's abuse that was supposed to shed light on the length of time it took to detect and address the abuse and any changes that may have occurred since has been criticized for its lack of transparency.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Gidan motsa jiki na Amurka da USOC suna da manufa ɗaya - sa wasan motsa jiki, da sauransu, ya zama mai aminci yadda zai yiwu 'yan wasa su bi mafarkinsu cikin aminci, tabbatacce kuma mai ba da ƙarfi.
mt: 1. The USOC and USA Gymnastics have one goal - to make the sport of gymnastics safe, so that athletes can compete with confidence, integrity and strength.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: A duk tsawon 1960, Brzezinski yayi ma John F. Kenedy aiki a matsayin mai bada shawara kuma yayi aiki da gwamnatin Lyndon B. Johnson.
mt: 1960-1977, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and worked in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: A yayin zabukan 1976 ya shawarci Carter kan manufofin kasashen waje, sannan ya zama mai ba da shawara kan Tsaro na kasa (NSA) daga 1977 zuwa 1981, ya gaji Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 campaign advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: kasancewarsa dan NSA, ya taimaka wa Carter a harkokin dokokin kasashen waje wajen kula da lamuran duniya, kamar Yarjejeniyar Camp David, 1978; daidaita alaƙar Amurka da China tana tunanin ƙarshen shekarun 1970; juyin juya halin Iran, wanda ya haifar da rikicin garkuwar da Iran, 1979; da mamayar Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: Ɗan NSA, ya taimaka wa Carter a harkokin dokokin kasashen waje wajen kula da lamuran duniya, kamar Yarjejeniyar Camp David, 1978; daidaita alaƙar Amurka da China tana tunanin ƙarshen shekarun 1970; juyin juya halin Iran, wanda ya haifar da rikicin garkuwar da Iran, 1979; da mamayar Soviet a Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Fin ɗin, da ke nuna Ryan Gosling da Emma Stone, ya sami shiga cikin duk manyan ɓangarorin gasar.
mt: 2017's La La Land, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, was nominated for all major awards.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling da Stone sun sami shiga neman cikin kyautar Fitaccen Jarumi da Jaruma.
mt: Gosling and Stone have been nominated for Best Actor and Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Sauran zaɓin sun hada da Hoto Mafi Kyau, Darakta, Majigi, Tsara Tufafi, Gyaran fina-finai, Makin Asali, Tsara Shiri, Gyara Sauti, Haɗa Sauti da kuma Asalin Labari.
mt: Other options include Best Shot, Director, Cut, Color Grading, Original, Raw, Audio Mix, Audio Sync, and News.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Waƙoƙi biyu daga fim, Audition (Wawaye Waɗanda Suke Mafarki) da Birnin Taurari, sun karɓi zaɓi don mafi kyawun waƙar asali. Lionsgate studio ta sami nadin 26 - fiye da kowane sauran ɗakunan studio.
mt: 2 songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Cry) and City of Lies, won the choice for best original song. Lionsgate studio won the nomination for 26 - more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: A daren ranar Lahadi shugaban kasar Amurka Donald Trump a cikin wata sanarwa da aka fitar ta sanarwar sakataren, ya sanar da dakarun kasar Amurka zasu bar kasar Syria.
mt: On Sunday, President Donald Trump in a statement from the White House announced U.S. troops will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: An bayar da sanarwar ce bayan Trump ya yi ganawa ta wayar salula da Shugaban Turkiyya Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdogan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Haka kuma Turkiyya za ta karbi aikin gadin mayakan ISIS da aka kama waɗanda, sanarwar ta ce, kasashen Turai suka ki mayar da su.
mt: Turkey will also take in the families of ISIS militants captured, the statement said, who, it added, Western countries refused to repatriate.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Wannan ya tabbatar cewa ba wai kawai wasu dabbobin dinasour suna da gashi ba, wata fadar ma da ta yadu, amma ta yi cikakken bayanin da rubabbun halittu ba za su iya ba, kamar su launi da kuma tsarin kashi uku.
mt: This confirms that not only dinosaurs had feathers, but also a tail, but not all, such as color and the three-part structure.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: Masana ilimin kimiya sun ce fiffiken dabbar launi kasa ne a sama mai dauke da kodaden launi da launin toka-toka ta karkashin ta.
mt: Scientists say the color of the sky is a result of the scattering of light by the atmosphere.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Binciken ya kuma ba da haske game da juyin halittar fukafiki a tsuntsaye.
mt: The study also revealed the evolutionary history of bird flight.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Domin gashin fuka-fukin dinosaur bashi da isasshen tsari, wanda ake kira kara, amma suna da sauran sifofin gashin fuka-fukan — tsandar gashi da kananan — masu binciken sun kammala cewa wata kila karan wani cigaba ne na juyin halittan wadannan sauran sifofin.
mt: Because of the fossil's poor preservation, which is called a mold, but it has other features of fossils — a cast and small — researchers have concluded that a mold is an evolutionary step of these other features.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Tsarin gashin fuka-fukan ya nuna cewa ba ana amfani da su ba ne domin tashi sama, sai dai domin samar da tsarin daidaiton dumin jiki da kuma motsawa. Binciken ya nuna cewa duk da cewa jelar ta wani karamin kakan kadangare ce, abin na nuna cewa gashin balagagge ne ba na dan tsako ba.
mt: The design of the fire vehicle shows that it is not intended for use in an elevated position, but rather for providing a stable platform for personnel and movement. The investigation showed that although the vehicle's cab is a small cab, it is not intended for use as a cab.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Masu binciken sun nuna cewa, duk da cewa sun gamsu jelar ta kakannin kadangare ce, ta kuma nuna cewa ta balagagge ce ba jariri ba.
mt: Researchers have shown that, despite being a cousin of the domesticated dog, it does not show any signs of domestication.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Jiya da safe a ƙasar Turkiyya, wani bom na cikin mota da aka tayar a hedikwatar ‘yansanda da ke Gaziantep, ya yi sanadiyyar mutuwar jami’an ‘yan sanda biyu tare da raunata wasu mutane sama da ashirin.
mt: 20 people were injured in a car bomb attack in Gaziantep, Turkey, killing two police officers.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Ofishin gwamnan ya ce jamia’an yan sanda goma sha tara ne su ka sami raunuka.
mt: 12 police officers were injured in the crash.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: 'Yan sanda sun ce suna zargin wani da ake zargin dan ta'addar Daesh (ISIL) ne da alhakin kai harin.
mt: Police say they suspect a suspected ISIL terrorist was behind the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Sun gano cewa Rana na aiki akan manufa iri daya kamar sauran taurari: An gano cewa ayukkan duk taurari a cikin tsarin suna samuwa ne ta hasken su, juyin su, banda haka babu komai.
mt: It was found that all the other components in the design were receiving power, cooling, and no damage.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Ana amfani da haskawa da juyawa tare domin sanin lambar Rossby ta tauraro, wadda take da alaƙa da gudanar jini.
mt: The Rossby radius of deformation, which is related to the Coriolis effect, is used to determine the scale of the eddies.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Karantar lambar Rossby, karancin mai aiki da tauraruwar dangane da sauyawar mayan karfe.
mt: The Rossby number, a measure of the strength of rotation relative to strain and vorticity.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: A lokacin tafiyarsa, Iwasaki ya shiga cikin matsala a lokuta da yawa.
mt: During his tenure, Iwasaki was involved in several scandals.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Yan fashin teku sun yi masa fashi, mahaukacin kare ya kai masa farmaki a Tibet, ya guje wa aure a Nepal kuma an kama shi a India.
mt: He was attacked by pirates, shot by guards in Tibet, escaped a wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Kwatancin 802.11n na aiki duk akan mita 2.4Ghz da 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n works on both 2.4GHz and 5.0GHz.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Wannan zai ba shi damar zama mai dacewa da baya 802.11a, 802.11b da 802.11g, matukar dai tashar tushe tana da rediyo biyu.
mt: This will allow it to be compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, with the main transmitter having dual radio.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Gudun 802.11n na da saurin da ya zarce na wanda ya gabace shi da tsaikon saurin da ya kai 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n has a speed of up to 600Mbit/s, surpassing its predecessor's speed of 300Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, wanda ke da mata da manyan yaya guda biyu, bai burge Miller ba, wanda ke da alaƙa da labarin.
mt: Duvall, who has two adult daughters, was not impressed by Miller, who has a history of reporting.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Da aka nemi tsokacinsa, sai Miller ya ce, “Mike ya yi magana da yawa lokacin zaman jin ba’asin...ina kan shiri saboda haka ban saurari abin da yake cewa ba.”
mt: When asked for his whereabouts, Miller said, "Mike has been talking a lot lately about his concerns...I'm not sure what he's talking about."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Za mu kokarin rage fitar da gurbataccen carbon dioxide a kowane bangare na GDP ta wani muhimmin mataki a 2020 daga matakin 2005,” in ji Hu.
mt: "We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions in every part of GDP at a key step in 2020 from the level of 2005," Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Bai sanya wani adadi don ragewar ba, inda ya ce hakan zai danganta ne da abin da tattalin arzikin China ke fitarwa.
mt: He did not give a figure for the damage, saying it would depend on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu ya karfafa kasashe masu tasowa “da su guji tsohuwar hanyar gurbatar da farko da kuma tsabtace ta daga baya.”
mt: He urged emerging countries to abandon the old path of first polluting and then cleaning up.
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Ya kara da cewa “ kada su yunkura, sai dai kuwa ana sa su daukar nauyi sama da na matakin cigaban su, da kuma daukan alhaki da iyawar su.”
mt: He added that “they should not be provoked, but they should be respected for their weight and dignity.”
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Kungiyar bincike na Iraq sun gabatar da rohotonsu da karfe 12.00 GMT a yau.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraqi investigation team will present their findings.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: An yi kashedin cewa babu tabbacin cewa duk wani mataki da za’a dauka a kasar Iraki a yanzu zai iya maganin yakin banbance banbance darika, karuwar rikici ko ma dosar rashin doka da oda.
mt: It is reported that no one in Iraq today can be sure of the outcome of the war, the increase in violence or the decrease in violence or the increase in the rule of law or the decrease in the rule of law.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Rahoton ya buɗe ne tare da roƙo don buɗe muhawara da kuma kafa yarjejeniya a Amurka game da manufofin Gabas ta Tsakiya.
mt: The report was released with a call for opening negotiations and establishing a policy in the United States regarding the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Rahoton ya yi matuƙar yin suka ga kusan dukkan ɓangarorin manufar Ɓangaren zartaswa na yanzu akan ƙasar Iraƙi inda ya nemi a gaggauta canja alƙibla.
mt: The report was highly critical of almost all aspects of the current mission in Iraq where it called for a complete change of direction.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Na farko daga cikin shawarwarin da ta ba su guda 78 shi ne cewa ya kamata a dauki wani sabon shiri na diflomasiyya kafin karshen wannan shekarar don kiyaye iyakokin Iraki kan tsoma bakin da ake yi da kuma sake kulla alakar diflomasiyya da makwabtanta.
mt: 1 of the 78 recommendations was to establish a new diplomatic mission before the end of this year to monitor the Iraqi border and reestablish diplomatic relations with neighbors.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Majalisar dattijai da matar shugaban kasar Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ta sanar da fitowar takarar shugaban kasa a yammacin jiya a La Plata, gari dake kilomita 50 (Mil 31) daga Buenos Aires.
mt: The Argentine Congress and President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner's husband announced her candidacy for re-election in the west of the country in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Mrs. Kirchner ta bayyana ra’niyyarta ta tsayawa takarar shugabanci a Gidan wasannin Argentina, wurin da ta yi amfani da shi domin fara kanfen ɗinta na takarar Majalisar Dattawa a shekarar 2005 a matsayinta na wakiliyar Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs. Kirchner stated that her husband had stood on the balcony of the Argentine Sports Palace, where he had used it to begin his campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a representative of Buenos Aires.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Muhawarar ta samo asali sakamakon rudani game da kashe kudi wajen bada tallafi da sake gine-gine bayan faruwar guguwar katrina, abinda masu ra’ayin mazan jiya su ke tsokana da cewa “Cuwa-cuwar Bush ta New Orleans”
mt: The debate originated over a dispute about spending aid for rebuilding after the Katrina hurricane, which conservatives opposed as “Bush’s New Orleans boondoggle”
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Korafe-korafe kan yunƙurin sake gine-ginen ya maida hankali ne a kan bayar da kwangilolin sake ginin ga waɗanda ake ganin ‘yan cikin gida ne a Washington.
mt: Ɗan ƙasar Amurka ne ya ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara ƙara
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Fiye da mutane miliyan huɗu suka je Rome don halartar jana’izar.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: mutanen da suka halarta sun yi yawa yadda ba zai yiwu kowa ya iya samun shiga wajen jana’izar ba da ke dandalin Peter.
mt: The mourners were so many that no one could get into the funeral procession for Peter.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: An kafa manya garkuwan talabijin da dama wurare da dama a Rome domin mutane su samu daman kallon bikin.
mt: Many major television stations and locations were set up in Rome for people to get a good view of the event.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: A sauran biranen kasar Italiya da kuma sauran kasashen duniya musamman a Poland, an kafa makamancin ginuwar wanda ya samu dubiyar jama’a da dama.
mt: In other Italian cities and other countries, especially in Poland, a shortage of construction workers has been created.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Masana tarihi sun soki manufofin Hukumar bincike ta Amurka saboda mai da hankali wajen laifuka wadanda ke da saukin warwarewa, musamman satar motoci, domin kawai su nuna yawan nasarar da su ke samu.
mt: Historians criticize the U.S. Justice Department for focusing on low-level offenses, especially car theft, in order to show high success rates.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Majalisa ta fara samar da kuɗaɗe ga tsarin batsa a kasafin kudi na 2005 kuma ta fayyace cewa dole FBI ta ware jami’ai 10 don lura da hotunan batsa na manya.
mt: 2005 budget hearings began and the FBI was ordered to hire 10 agents to investigate child pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthapa ya ci makunan wasan kriket mafi sama, guduwa 70 cikin kawai ƙwallaye 41 ta hanyar bugawa huɗu guda 11 da kuma shida guda 2.
mt: 70-year-old Robin Uthappa scored the highest score in cricket, running 70 out of 41 balls by hitting four fours and two sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: ‘Yan wasan kurket na tsakiya, Sachin Tendulkar da Rahul Dravid, sun yi kokari kuma sun yi haɗin gwiwa tare a Tseren-ɗari.
mt: Middle-order cricketers Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, both in their 40s, have been battling and collaborating in Test cricket.
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Amma, bayan rashin nasarar kyaftin din wicket Indiya kawai tayi asarar guda 36 tana kwance wickets 7 don kawo karshen innings.
mt: But after the Indian wicketkeeper dropped a catch, India only lost 36 runs with 7 wickets remaining to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Shugaban kasar America George W. Bush ya iso Singapore a safiya 16 ga Nuwanba, domin fara yawon bude ido na tsawon mako daya a Asiya.
mt: 16 November, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore for a one-day tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Mataimakin Firayi Ministan Singapore Wong Kan Sang ne ya tarbe shi, sannan su ka tattauna al’amuran kasuwanci da ta’addanci tare da Firayi Ministan Singapore Lee Hsien Loong.
mt: 2nd Finance Minister Wong Kan Seng was the one who met him, and they discussed business and corruption issues with Singaporean Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Bayan mako guda da shan kaye a zabukan tsakiyar wa’adi, Bush ya fada wa wasu magoya baya fadadar kasuwanci a Asiya.
mt: After a day of meetings with business leaders in Asia, Bush flew to Australia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Firayi Minista Stephen Harper, ya amince da aika kudurin ‘Dokar “Tsarkakakkiyar Iska’ zuwa ga kwamitin gamayyar jam’iyyu don sake dubawa, kafin ayi mata karatu na biyu, bayan taron mintuna 25 na ranar Talata tare da shugaban jam’iyyar NDP Jack Layton a PMO.
mt: Minister Stephen Harper, agreed to send the "Airspace Modernization Act" to the committee for review, before giving it a second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton ya nemi canje-canje ga dokar ra’ayin mazan jiya yanayi lokacin haduwa da Firayim Ministan, yana tambaya don “cikakken sake rubutawar” dokan Jam'iyyar ra’ayin mazan jiya.
mt: Layton asked for changes to the climate change bill during a meeting with the Prime Minister, asking for a "complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's climate change bill.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Tun daga lokacin da Gwamnatin Tarayya ta shiga daukar nauyin asibitin Mersey da ke Devonport, Tasmania, gwamnatin jihar da wasu ‘yan majalisar tarayya sun soki wannan aikin a matsayin ci gaban shirin zaben tarayya da za a kira a watan Nuwamba.
mt: Since the Federal Government took over the management of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised the move as a ploy to boost the federal election campaign in November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Amma Firayim Minista John Howard ya ce dokar an yi ta ne domin kare ginin asibitin domin kada gwamnatin Tasmania ta rage masa kima, wajen kara kudaden da dala miliyan 45 ta Australiya.
mt: But Prime Minister John Howard said the law was made to protect the building from the Tasmanian government reducing its value, in order to increase the $45 million Australian tax bill.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Labari na baya bayan nan ya nuna cewa, nazarin motsin teku na nuna alamun wata tsunami ta taso. Hakika an tabbatar da alamun tsunami a kusa da Pago da Niue.
mt: The article previously reported that, a study of the ocean's movement indicated the possibility of a tsunami. It was confirmed that tsunami warnings were issued for Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Ba a sami wata mummunar barna ko jin ciwo a rahoton da ke fitowa daga Tonga ba, amma kuma wutar lantarki ta katse, abinda ya hana hukumomi samun sanarwar gargadin tsunami wanda hukumar PTWC ta bayar.
mt: There were no reports of damage or injury in Tonga, but power was cut, preventing officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by the Pacific Tsunami Warning Center.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: An rufe duk makarantu goma sha hudu a Huawaii wadanda suke kusa da bakin teku a ranar Laraba duk da cewa an janye jan kunnen.
mt: 14 schools on the island of Hawaii near the coast were closed on Tuesday despite the cancellation of classes.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Shugaban Amurka George W. Bush ya yi maraba da sanarwar.
mt: President George W. Bush congratulated the team.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Mai magana da yawun Bush Gordon Johndroe ya kira alwashin da Koriya ta Arewa ta yi “babban mataki ne ga burin cimma nasarar narkar da makaman nukiliya na zirin Koriya.”
mt: White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's move "a major step forward in achieving the goal of eliminating North Korea's nuclear weapons program."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Guguwar teku ta goma da aka sakawa suna Jerry a kakar guguwar tekun Atalantika ta fara a yau.
mt: 10-foot waves are expected to begin hitting the Atlantic coast today.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Cibiyar kula da guguwar teku ta kasa (NHC) ta ce a yanzu guguwar Jerry ba ta da wani hadari ga doron kasa.
mt: The National Hurricane Center says that at this time Hurricane Jerry poses no threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: {Ungiyar Injiniya ta Amurka ta kiyasta cewa inci 6 na ruwan sama zai iya keta ragowar guguwar da ta gabata.
mt: 6 inches of rain could exceed the previous record.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Unguwa ta tara, wacce ta ga ambaliyar ruwa har sama da ƙafa 20 a lokacin Guguwar Katrina, a halin yanzu tana cikin ruwa mai ɗumbin yawa yayin da levee na kusa ya cika.
mt: 20 feet of water above the roofline during Hurricane Katrina, the levee is now overtopped.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Ruwa na zubewa kan levee a sashi mai fadin kafa 100.
mt: 100 square meters of levee was washed away.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Mai Gudanarwa na Ƙaramar Majalisa Adam Cuerden ya nuna ɓacin ransa a game da sharewa a lokacin da ya ke magana da Wikinews a watan da ya gabata.
mt: Ƙaramar Majalisa Adam Cuerden ya nuna ɓacin ransa a game da sharewa a lokacin da ya ke magana da Wikinews a watan da ya gabata.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “Tun daga farko [Wales] ta yi mana karya. Na farko, ta hanyar yin kamar wannan saboda dalilai ne na doka. Na biyu, ta hanyar yin kamar yana sauraron mu, har zuwa goge fasaharsa.”
mt: “Wales has been doing us a disservice. First, by doing this for legal reasons. Second, by doing this to our detriment, even to the point of destroying our industry.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Fushin al’ummar ya kai ga ƙoƙarin da ake yi na samar da tsari dangane da al’amuran da suka jibanci jima’i a shafin da ke daukar miliyoyin kafafen yada labarai da ke da lasisi.
mt: The public outcry led to attempts to create guidelines based on the issues that arose on the site that had millions of licensed news feeds.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Mafi yawancin aiki da aka yi a rubuce ne, amma an tsara tsarin ne domin bunkasa lura da ake wa taurarin Sagittarius.
mt: Most of the work was done in writing, but a system was designed to develop awareness of Sagittarius A*.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Tasirin da ƙungiyar ke nema zai haifar ne ta hanyar karfi tsakanin igiyar ruwa tsakanin galaxy da Milky Way mai duhu.
mt: Ƙungiyar ke neman tasirin da ke haifar da karfin tsakanin igiyar ruwa tsakanin galaxy da Milky Way mai duhu.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Kamar yadda maganadisun wata ya ke jan duniya, inda hakan ke haddasa murɗawar igiyar ruwa, haka dabakar milky way ke tasiri kan dabakar saggitarius.
mt: As the moon rises, it causes the tides, and the milky way affects the tides of sagittarius.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Masana kimiyyar sun sami damar karkare bayani cewa lamarin baki zai iya shafar waninsa daidai da yadda lamarin da aka saba yake yi.
mt: Scientists have found a way to make the process as simple as it is now.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Wannan ka'idar tana cewa mafi akasarin duhun da ke kusa da galaxy ana samun shi ne a kusa da galaxy a wani nau'in halo, kuma an yi shi da kananan kananan kwayoyi.
mt: This model predicts that most of the dark matter in a galaxy is found in a halo around the galaxy, and is made up of small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Rahotannin talabijin sun nuna farin hayaki na fitowa daga shukar.
mt: Television reports show flames coming from the wreckage.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Mahukuntan yankin suna gargadin mazauna yankin da ke kusa da masana’antar da su kasance cikin gidajensu, a kashe na’urorin sanyaya ɗaki kuma kada a sha ruwan famfo.
mt: Residents near the plant are advised to stay in their homes, turn off air conditioning and not to drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: A cewar hukumar nukiliya ta Japan, an gano sinadaran caesium da iodine masu hadari a ma’aikatar.
mt: According to the Japanese Nuclear Agency, radioactive cesium and iodine were found in the building.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Hukumomi suna hasashen cewa wannan yana nuna cewa mai yiwuwa gangunan da a ke ajiye man uranium a wurin sun fashe kuma suna zuba.
mt: Authorities are speculating that this may indicate that the uranium stockpiles at the site have exploded and are leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dokta Tony Moll ya gano kwayar cutar tarin fuka (XDR-TB) a yankin Afirka ta Kudu KwaZulu-Natal.
mt: Dr Tony Moll identified the strain of tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: A cikin wata hira, ya ce sabuwar cutar “na da matukar tada hankali da firgitarwa saboda yawan mace-macen da ta ke haddasawa.”
mt: In an interview, he said the new disease “has a lot of attention and concern because of the number of deaths it causes.”
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Kila wasu marasa lafiya sun kamu da cutar a asibiti, Dokta Moll yana tsammani, kuma aƙalla biyu sun kasance ma'aikatan kiwon lafiya na asibiti.
mt: Some patients contracted the disease at the hospital, Dr. Moll is speculating, and at least two were hospital staff.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
